gems.name: Daily Gems
gems.flavorText: Gems, what do you even expect?

honey.name: Honey
honey.flavorText: A special currency from Bizzy Bees event of Grow a Garden!

repoints.name: Repoints
repoints.flavorText: Earned during late-night relapses—each one a moment you stayed in control.

relapseEnergy.name: Relapse Energy
relapseEnergy.flavorText: Surging from emotional overloads—raw, charged, and restless. You didn't break… you just sparked.
